lead_paragraph: Banished from the N.F.L. for four weeks, San Diego Chargers linebacker Shawne Merriman said he is not a steroid cheat. He also suggested he is a victim of the league’s drug testing policy. Merriman visited Chargers headquarters yesterday to address his teammates before beginning a four-game suspension for testing positive for the steroid nandrolone. He and his lawyer have blamed a tainted supplement.
